question: The difference between a discount of 40% on 500 Rs. and two successive discounts of 30% and 10% on the same amount is :
explanation:
Single equivalent discount of two consecutive discount of 30%  and 10%.
$latex = 30+10-\\frac{30\\times 10}{100} = 37\\%&s=1$

$latex = 500\\times \\frac{3}{100} = 15\\ Rs.&s=1$
